game.name: Dungeon
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dungeon is a 90's style FPS where you play as John Grimm, a soldier trapped in a medieval dungeon filled with hidden rooms, zombies, and traps. Uncover secrets and Easter eggs while battling five powerful, element-themed bosses that hold the keys to your escape. Explore, fight, and choose your path!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dungeon is a 90's style FPS where you play as John Grimm, a soldier trapped in a medieval dungeon filled with hidden rooms, zombies, and traps. Uncover secrets and Easter eggs while battling five powerful, element-themed bosses that hold the keys to your escape. Explore, fight, and choose your path!
